author: Madeline Roache
title: Austria Requires Masks to be Worn Amid Plans to Ease Coronavirus Lockdown
description: Austria is set to be one of the first countries in Europe to ease its lockdown against the coronavirus outbreak. The conservative-led government announced plans on Monday to start reopening non-essential stores next week, after reaching a downward trend in th…
